outline:
1. to learn. teach, exercise in
    1. (Qal) to learn
    2. (Piel) to teach
    3. (Pual) to be taught, be trained
kjv_def: (un-) accustomed, [idiom] diligently, expert, instruct, learn, skilful, teach(-er, -ing).
strongs_def: properly, to goad, i.e. (by implication) to teach (the rod being an Oriental incentive)
